iron_core/segment.documentation: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description.

iron_core/segment/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments.

iron_core/segment/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments.

iron_core/segment/b_field.documentation: Array of magnetic field values, for each of which the relative permeability is given. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments.

iron_core/segment/permeability_relative.documentation: Relative permeability of the iron segment. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments.

iron_core/segment/geometry.documentation: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments.

iron_core/segment/geometry/geometry_type.documentation: Type used to describe the element shape (1:'outline', 2:'rectangle', 3:'oblique', 4:'arcs of circle, 5: 'annulus', 6 : 'thick line'). Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment.

iron_core/segment/geometry/outline.documentation: Irregular outline of the element. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment.

iron_core/segment/geometry/outline/r.documentation: Major radius. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the element. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

iron_core/segment/geometry/outline/z.documentation: Height. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the element. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

iron_core/segment/geometry/rectangle.documentation: Rectangular description of the element. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment.

iron_core/segment/geometry/rectangle/r.documentation: Geometric centre R. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within rectangle container: Rectangular description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/rectangle/z.documentation: Geometric centre Z. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within rectangle container: Rectangular description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/rectangle/wid.documentation: Horizontal full width. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within rectangle container: Rectangular description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/rectangle/hei.documentation: Vertical full height. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within rectangle container: Rectangular description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/oblique.documentation: Parallelogram description of the element. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment.

iron_core/segment/geometry/oblique/r.documentation: Major radius of the reference point (from which the alpha and beta angles are defined, marked by a + on the diagram). Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within oblique container: Parallelogram description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/oblique/z.documentation: Height of the reference point (from which the alpha and beta angles are defined, marked by a + on the diagram). Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within oblique container: Parallelogram description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/oblique/lengt.documentation: Length of the parallelogram side inclined with angle alpha with respect to the major radius axis. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within oblique container: Parallelogram description of the element.

Length of the parallelogram side inclined with angle beta with respect to the height axis. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within oblique container: Parallelogram description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/oblique/alpha.documentation: Inclination of first angle measured counter-clockwise from horizontal outwardly directed radial vector (grad R). Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within oblique container: Parallelogram description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/oblique/beta.documentation: Inclination of second angle measured counter-clockwise from vertically upwards directed vector (grad Z). If both alpha and beta are zero (rectangle) then the simpler rectangular elements description should be used. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within oblique container: Parallelogram description of the element.

iron_core/segment/geometry/arcs_of_circl.documentation: Description of the element contour by a set of arcs of circle. For each of these, the position of the start point is given together with the curvature radius. The end point is given by the start point of the next arc of circle. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment.

Major radii of the start point of each arc of circle. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within arcs_of_circle container: Description of the element contour by a set of arcs of circle. For each of these, the position of the start point is given together with the curvature radius. The end point is given by the start point of the next arc of circle.

Height of the start point of each arc of circle. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within arcs_of_circle container: Description of the element contour by a set of arcs of circle. For each of these, the position of the start point is given together with the curvature radius. The end point is given by the start point of the next arc of circle.

Curvature radius of each arc of circle. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within arcs_of_circle container: Description of the element contour by a set of arcs of circle. For each of these, the position of the start point is given together with the curvature radius. The end point is given by the start point of the next arc of circle.

iron_core/segment/geometry/annulus.documentation: The element is an annulus of centre R, Z, with inner radius radius_inner and outer radius radius_outer. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment.

iron_core/segment/geometry/annulus/r.documentation: Centre major radius. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within annulus container: The element is an annulus of centre R, Z, with inner radius radius_inner and outer radius radius_outer.

iron_core/segment/geometry/annulus/z.documentation: Centre height. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within annulus container: The element is an annulus of centre R, Z, with inner radius radius_inner and outer radius radius_outer.

iron_core/segment/geometry/annulus/radiu.documentation: Inner radius. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within annulus container: The element is an annulus of centre R, Z, with inner radius radius_inner and outer radius radius_outer.

Outer radius. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within annulus container: The element is an annulus of centre R, Z, with inner radius radius_inner and outer radius radius_outer.

iron_core/segment/geometry/thick_line.documentation: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment.

iron_core/segment/geometry/thick_line/fi.documentation: Position of the first point. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within thick_line container: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment.

Major radius. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within thick_line container: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Height. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within thick_line container: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

iron_core/segment/geometry/thick_line/se.documentation: Position of the second point. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within thick_line container: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment.

Major radius. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within thick_line container: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Height. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within thick_line container: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

iron_core/segment/geometry/thick_line/th.documentation: Thickness. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within geometry container: Cross-sectional shape of the segment. Within thick_line container: The element is approximated by a rectangle defined by a central segment and a thickness in the direction perpendicular to the segment.

iron_core/segment/magnetization_r.documentation: Magnetization M of the iron segment along the major radius axis, assumed to be constant inside a given iron segment. Reminder : H = 1/mu0 * B - mur * M;. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments.

iron_core/segment/magnetization_r/data.documentation: Data. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within magnetization_r container: Magnetization M of the iron segment along the major radius axis, assumed to be constant inside a given iron segment. Reminder : H = 1/mu0 * B - mur * M;.

iron_core/segment/magnetization_r/time.documentation: Time. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within magnetization_r container: Magnetization M of the iron segment along the major radius axis, assumed to be constant inside a given iron segment. Reminder : H = 1/mu0 * B - mur * M;.

iron_core/segment/magnetization_z.documentation: Magnetization M of the iron segment along the vertical axis, assumed to be constant inside a given iron segment. Reminder : H = 1/mu0 * B - mur * M;. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments.

iron_core/segment/magnetization_z/data.documentation: Data. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within magnetization_z container: Magnetization M of the iron segment along the vertical axis, assumed to be constant inside a given iron segment. Reminder : H = 1/mu0 * B - mur * M;.

iron_core/segment/magnetization_z/time.documentation: Time. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description. Within segment container: The iron core is describred as a set of segments. Within magnetization_z container: Magnetization M of the iron segment along the vertical axis, assumed to be constant inside a given iron segment. Reminder : H = 1/mu0 * B - mur * M;.

iron_core/time.documentation: Generic time. Within iron_core IDS: Iron core description.
